ygData.subject: RE: Effects of AGI
ygData.msgSnippet: i m looking forward to the breastplate, which is probably the hardest item to get with crafted, and with lambent i already have one piece for (the gypsy lute).
ygData.messageBody:
i'm looking forward to the breastplate, which is probably the hardest item
to get with crafted, and with lambent i already have one piece for (the
gypsy lute). and basalt gargoyles for the other piece are fairly easy in
lower guk at this point.

Shada

> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Thu, Oct 07/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
> >
> > looking forward to the new lambent armor quests found in
> the temple of
> > solusek ro. wonder if there will be stats on it other than
> just increased
> > AC like crafted.
>
> I hope so, those quests sound a little tougher than the ones for plain
> warrior crafted.
